docs.title: Distribution Percentage based on Standard Deviation
docs.text:
• Flawless: 0% to 9.99%
  • Perfect: 10% to 19.99%
  • Great: 20% to 29.99%
  • Good: 30% to 39.99%
  • Average: 40% to 49.99%
  • Okay: 50% to 59.99%
  • Uneven: 60% to 69.99%
  • Bad: 70% to 79.99%
  • Terrible: more than 80%

docs.title: How to Use?
docs.text:
Enter the % of each member have in the song (separate by commas, spaces, semicolons, or line breaks):

Decimal places: Calculate Clear
